Name: Argentina Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A wet martini softened by liqueur and given a hint of citrus and spice.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Argentina Cocktail contains 143 calories
